competitors.name: Tenable (Nessus)
competitors.notes: Leading vulnerability scanning with Nessus engine

competitors.name: Qualys
competitors.notes: Cloud security platform with compliance and automation

competitors.name: FireEye
competitors.notes: Advanced threat detection and incident response

context: By 2010, the cybersecurity market had matured with specialized vendors in vulnerability management and SIEM. Rapid7 established itself with Metasploit framework and expanded into commercial VM solutions. Cloud-based platforms like Qualys gained traction.
